dialog.text: Rang Mum today, told her that wanted to move back home.  Don't want to move back in with my folks but I think its for the best, Pete just doesn't understand me anymore.  Did I tell you what he said to me yesterday?

joins.text: I know right!  How dare he say that I thought I was better than him?
Well, we got into an argument and he said that I thought I was better than him!

dialog.text: I hope your life isn't as chaotic as this.  I guess we all have our problems though, right?  Anyway, I'd better finish off as I have work this weekend.  Have a good one!
